Package net.nextinfinity.core.arena

Interface ScoreboardManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoreScoreboardManager

    public interface ScoreboardManager
    The ScoreboardManager manges the Scoreboard and BossBar for an individual Arena. This is the functional in-game UI, which displays player scores and time remaining.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearBoard​(GamePlayer player)
      Resets the sidebar scoreboard for the player to a blank scoreboard.
      void refreshScores​()
      Refresh the scores in the scoreboard managed by this ScoreboardManager.
      void refreshTime​(int time, int initialTime)
      Refresh the time on the scoreboard and bossbar to the set time.
      void setBoard​(GamePlayer player)
      Sets the sidebar scoreboard for the player to the scoreboard managed by the ScoreboardManager.

    • Method Detail

      • refreshTime

        void refreshTime​(int time,
                 int initialTime)
        Refresh the time on the scoreboard and bossbar to the set time.
        Parameters:
        time - the time remaining
        initialTime - the initial time, used for the bossbar countdown

      • setBoard

        void setBoard​(GamePlayer player)
        Sets the sidebar scoreboard for the player to the scoreboard managed by the ScoreboardManager.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to set the scoreboard for

      • clearBoard

        void clearBoard​(GamePlayer player)
        Resets the sidebar scoreboard for the player to a blank scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to reset the scoreboard for

      • refreshScores

        void refreshScores​()
        Refresh the scores in the scoreboard managed by this ScoreboardManager.
